cu.explanation_en: Setting Num_Threads_PUSCH to 0 will cause processing failure as zero threads are invalid for PUSCH handling.

du.explanation_en: Setting absoluteFrequencySSB to 0 will cause cell setup failure as SSB frequency must be a positive value within the valid range.
du.explanation_zh: 將 absoluteFrequencySSB 設定為 0 會導致小區設定失敗，因為 SSB 頻率必須是有效範圍內的正值。
